services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Specialized treatments for your smile
services.ctaText: Ready to transform your smile? Book a consultation.

digital.title: Digital Dentistry
digital.desc:
Digital dentistry integrates advanced technology such as intraoral scanners, 3D software, and CAD/CAM systems to provide precise diagnoses and personalized treatments.

This approach enhances patient comfort, reduces intervention time, and enables highly aesthetic and functional results.

With digital dentistry, each procedure is carefully planned, facilitating durable restorations, advanced orthodontics, and custom-made prosthetics.

This is the future of dentistry‚Äîit combines innovation, efficiency, and personalized care to optimize your oral health.

whitening.title: Teeth Whitening
whitening.desc:
Teeth whitening is an aesthetic treatment that improves the color of the teeth, removing stains and brightening their natural shade.

It is a safe and effective procedure that can be performed in-office or at home, tailored to each patient‚Äôs needs.

Benefits:

  • Enhances your smile and self-confidence.
  • Visible results in just a few sessions.
  • Quick, minimally invasive procedure.

An ideal treatment for those seeking a whiter, more radiant smile.

veneers.title: Ceramic Veneers (Cosmetic Smile Design)
veneers.desc:
These are ultra-thin ceramic shells bonded to the front surface of your teeth to improve their shape, color, and size.

Highly aesthetic: Achieve a totally natural appearance, similar to enamel.
Durable: Resistant and color-stable over time.
Conservative: Require minimal tooth reduction.
Versatile: Correct chips, spaces, stains, and dental discrepancies.

With veneers, your smile not only changes externally‚Äîit also reflects the confidence and assurance within.

cleaning.title: Professional Dental Cleaning
cleaning.desc:
Professional dental cleaning removes plaque and tartar buildup to prevent gum disease and cavities.

This procedure leaves your mouth feeling fresh and helps maintain long-term oral health.
Benefits:

  • Removes stain and bacteria not eliminated by everyday brushing.
  • Promotes healthy gums and prevents inflammation.
  • Polishes enamel for a brighter smile.

Regular cleanings are essential for a healthy, radiant smile.

jewelry.title: Dental Jewelry ‚Äì Gold / Silver Grillz
jewelry.desc: Customize your smile with safe, tailor-made designs.

smileDesign.title: Advanced Smile Design
smileDesign.desc:
This is a personalized treatment designed to harmonize the shape, color, and size of your teeth with your facial features.

Aesthetic and functional: Not only does it improve the beauty of your smile, it also supports chewing and oral health.
Personalized: Each design is tailored to your personality, features, and expectations.
Versatile: May include resins, veneers, crowns, or other procedures as needed.
Transformative: A renewed smile has a direct impact on your confidence and security.

Smile design doesn‚Äôt change who you are‚Ä¶ it brings out your best and restores your confidence to smile without limits.

rehabImplant.title: Rehabilitation with Metal Core
rehabImplant.desc:
Rehabilitation with a metal core is a dental procedure that restores tooth structure using custom-fitted metal posts as a base for crowns or bridges.

These cores are made to provide exceptional mechanical strength and stability, especially in teeth that have lost significant structure.

Advantages:

  • High durability and resistance to chewing forces.
  • Provides strong support for final restorations.
  • Helps preserve and fortify weakened teeth.

This type of rehabilitation is widely used to restore function and aesthetics in endodontically treated or severely damaged teeth, ensuring a healthy, functional smile.

prosthesis.title: Complete Denture
prosthesis.desc:
A removable device designed to replace all teeth when lost in one or both arches.

Main benefits:

  • Restores chewing function and phonetics.
  • Supports lips and face, improving overall facial aesthetics.
  • Restores confidence by enabling you to smile and speak securely.

Modern dentures are crafted with advanced techniques that provide greater comfort, better fit, and a much more natural appearance.

Regaining your smile also means reclaiming your quality of life.

prosthesis2.title: Bio-characterized Acrylic Dentures
prosthesis2.desc:
These removable acrylic dentures go beyond just replacing teeth: they are designed to closely mimic natural gum and tooth tissues, resulting in a harmonious and realistic smile.

Benefits:

  • Gums characterized with natural shades and textures.
  • Teeth with lifelike color and shapes.
  • Greater comfort and adaptability.
  • A functional, aesthetic, and affordable option to restore your smile.

With bio-characterized acrylic dentures, you not only regain your ability to chew and smile‚Äîyou also regain the confidence to look and feel your best.

Bordeincisal.title: Incisal Edge
Bordeincisal.desc:
This is the thinnest and most translucent part of the front teeth (incisors), the area that directly contacts food during biting.

Importance:

  • Contributes naturalness and brightness to your smile.
  • Its shape and length influence facial harmony.
  • If worn or fractured, it can affect both aesthetics and function.

Using resins, veneers, or crowns, it is possible to restore the incisal edge, regaining balance, beauty, and health for your smile.

alquimia.title: Alquimia Dental
alquimia.lead: Dentistry is not only technique or aesthetics ‚Äî it is {{t}}.
alquimia.copy: Just like ancient alchemy sought to turn metals into gold, our purpose is to transform pain, insecurity, or wear into {{b}}, {{c}}, and {{l}}.

philosophy.title: Brand philosophy
philosophy.quote: A renewed smile is not only aligned or white teeth; it is a mirror of the soul that reflects self-love, confidence, and personal power.
philosophy.p1: Here, every treatment becomes a ritual of transformation: each veneer, smile design, and aesthetic detail is a key that opens doors to a new version of yourself.

bullets.art: Aesthetic art to enhance your natural beauty.
bullets.connection: Emotional and spiritual connection: smiling is also healing.

proposal.text: What are you waiting for to transform your smile at Alquimia Dental¬Æ?

testimonials.moreText: Want to read more real reviews?

alejandra.author: Alejandra Cabarique Garcia
alejandra.text: ‚ÄúA professional dedicated to her patients, very responsible and detail-oriented; but also human and full of empathy. It‚Äôs the first time I‚Äôve found a dentist who doesn‚Äôt scare me during procedures. I recommend her üòå‚Äù

milena.author: Milena Gracia
milena.text: ‚ÄúI‚Äôd like to express my complete satisfaction with the service provided by Dr. Sorany, who gave me a smile design that exceeded all my expectations. From the first moment she showed professionalism, guiding me clearly and thoroughly through the entire process. The result gave me great confidence when smiling. She used top-quality materials and her recommendations were very clear. Totally recommended!‚Äù

carlos.author: Carlos Libardo Lopez Penaloza
carlos.text: ‚ÄúI used to be terrified of dentists‚Ä¶ and with Dr. Sorany I found a professional who understands nervous patients like me. I was so delighted that I recommended many friends and brought my son for treatment. Thank you so much!‚Äù

angelica.author: Ang√©lica Parra
angelica.text: ‚ÄúExcellent work! I went in urgently for a broken filling. They treated me warmly and professionally, explaining not only the urgent issue but also the general state of my teeth. Recommended for her polished work: I was very happy with the result.‚Äù

brigitte.author: Brigitte Martinez D.
brigitte.text: ‚ÄúExcellent oral rehabilitator. I had an emergency with my veneers and Dr. Sorany explained and recommended what was best for my dental health. After the procedure the result was wonderful: she gave me my smile back. Highly recommended!‚Äù

john.author: John Ortiz
john.text: ‚ÄúI recommend Dr. Sorany‚Äôs work. She is very punctual and clear from the start without stretching out or overpricing the treatment. She made 2 crowns and several fillings for me; I was very satisfied with her work.‚Äù

dayanna.author: Dayanna S√°nchez
dayanna.text: ‚ÄúDr. Sorany has treated me for more than 8 years and she is a great professional. Her diagnoses are always accurate and her way of working is impeccable. Highly recommended.‚Äù
